name: Quantity Changer On CheckOut For WooCommerce
author: Kshirod Patel

sections.description:
Quantity Changer On CheckOut For WooCommerce is a simple and light weight add-on for WooCommerce which simply allows your users to update the quantity of products by showing quantity box and gives the options to remove the products directly from the checkout page.

This option gives ability to your users to modify their cart content directly from the checkout page without going to the cart page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “Quantity Changer On CheckOut For WC” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Installation complete
sections.faq:
Will this plugin work without WooCommerce?

This plugin doesn’t work without WooCommerce. You need to install and activate WooCommerce to make this plugin work.

Will this plugin work with my existing theme?

Yes the plugin should work with any WooCommerec compatible theme. If it doesn’t work with your theme then please try to actiave any default WordPress theme and check.

I have a suggestion/query . Where should I contact you?

You can always contact through by email. Just drop your queries/suggestions at kshirod.patel@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1

  • Fixed issue with WooCommerce 3.8
  • Readme updated

Version 1.0

  • Initial public realease
